cause.description:
Ocasa is a colombian NGO that has worked for nearly four years in the promoting of spaces of citizen participation for young people.
1. Young people have an acative rol in their coumminties
2. corruption and dishonest behaviors must end.
3. The constant atacks of Colombia'n democracy must end inmediatly.
cause.mission: Involve youth people in the stregthening of democracy thru the fight against corruption
cause.name: Ocasa
